text: Marysville is a city in and the county seat of Union County, Ohio, United States. The population was 25,571 at the 2020 census. This marks a 15.7% increase from 2010. Marysville's longtime slogan is "Where the Grass is Greener". In December 2008, Marysville was designated as a "Preserve America Community" by the First Lady Laura Bush. == References == Category:Cities in Ohio Category:County seats in Ohio
title: Marysville, Ohio
